item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Large London office buildings proving almost impossible to sell
2. Donors and Democrats despair as push to sideline Biden fizzles
3. Badenoch attacks Sunak over Tory election defeat
4. Type of Russian missile that struck Kyiv children’s hospital uses western components
5. Recriminations fly in Le Pen’s party over French election result
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 at 12:25 PM UTC
